trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that enables access to a serializer.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个接口，使序列化程序的访问。

trans-unit.source: This interface has only one method, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer%2A>, and no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: 此接口只包含一个方法， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer%2A>，并且没有属性或事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This interface and this method exist so that the serialization manager and other objects can obtain a serializer for a given object type.
trans-unit.target: 此接口，此方法存在，以便序列化管理器和其他对象可以获取给定的对象类型的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a serializer using the specified attributes.
trans-unit.target: 获取使用指定的属性的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager calls this method when it is trying to locate a serializer for an object type.
trans-unit.target: 当它尝试找到的对象类型的序列化程序时，序列化管理器将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If this serialization provider can provide a serializer of the correct type, this provider returns it.
trans-unit.target: 如果此序列化提供程序可以提供正确类型的序列化程序，此提供程序将返回它。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager requesting the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 请求序列化程序序列化管理器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the current serializer of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 当前序列化指定类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no serializer of the specified type exists.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不存在指定类型的任何序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The data type of the object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化对象数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The data type of the serializer to create.
trans-unit.target: 序列化程序创建的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a serializer of the type requested, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the request cannot be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 请求，类型的序列化程序的实例或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果请求不能满足。
